message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a mutually beneficial transaction. We kindly propose a purchase price of $950,000 for the product. This offer not only allows us to recoup a significant portion of its value but also provides you with an opportunity to secure this valuable asset at a price that is higher than what we would offer to other potential buyers. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a successful transaction.
